name: Ball Smash 3D: Hit Same Color
description:
Ball Smash 3D game is an exciting adventure of the bouncing ball through the spiral helix.

One-tap easy-to-learn controls, rich visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics.


HOW TO PLAY:
* Rotate the helix maze by sliding your finger horizontally across your screen to guide the jumping ball through the gaps in the helix tower.
* Be careful to not let the jumping ball hit the red planks in the helix maze or it's game over!
